comments:
With 0.4.10, I got this error 

failure on disposing commit wizard

after:

1) Commit context...
2) Cancel

Note that I also reported a somewhat similar problem that was marked resolved: bug #131776
Thanks, note that this error is innocuous, but there is now a guard to ensure that the commit wizard does not throw it.
